text: Members of the Tamil Nadu Association for Rights of All Types of Differently Abled and Caregivers staged a sit-in protest in front of the Taluk Office here on Tuesday to demand rescinding the order that stipulates eligibility of governmental aid only in case of orphans of the differently abled, resuming grant of aid for the differently abled and conduct of a special grievance meet every month for them.
title: Sit-in protest by the differently abled
